name: JellyDome
description:
Welcome to the JellyDome! Trapped in an underwater dome facility, the player must activate and solve 4 puzzles that will generate gears and unlock the escape hatch. Good luck!

Credits:

DePaul University College of Computing and Digital Media
Game Development Capstone Class of 2017
Team: Capsule Co. - Andrew Graves (Programming/Technical Design), Junior Bustamante (Modeling/Animation/Design), Antonio Caringella (Art/Texture), Ken Weber (Production/Design), Ken Erlichman (Concept/Environment)
Soundtrack: Banjo-Tooie "Grunty Industries (Underwater)"
Assets: Aquarium FishPack 1.0 - Author Unknown, Rocks and Boulders 2 1.1 - Manufactura K4, Underwater FX 1.4 - Rivermill Studios, Yughues Underwater Plants v.2 2.0 - Nobiax/Yughues
